name: GMPCreatr

In this version, there is more customization, updates, and new things added monthly!

GMPCreatr Classic:

For no updates and less customization, go here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/527359903/

 GMPCreatr Standard:

For the updates monthly, and small updates, go here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/527359903/

The index file is the game.
